identity.title: Care Rule for Echocardiogram
identity.description: Care Rule to encourage Echocardiogram to confirm diagnosis of Congestive Heart Failure

resource.title: Regenstrief Care Rules C06
resource.description: C06 is the file of Preventive Care Rules used to generate reminders for non-real-time preventive care at the time of a patient's presentation to an outpatient clinic

identity.title: DIAGNOSIS
identity.description: Reminder to order Echocardiogram to confirm diagnosis of Congestive Heart Failure

identity.title: Rule: Order Echo for Diagnosis of CHF
identity.description: This rule asks doctors to order echocardiogram for their patients with the diagnosis of CHF but no echo was ever done (regardless of result)

LogicalConditionSingle.title: Diagnosis of CHF
LogicalConditionSingle.description: Patient has documentation of a diagnosis of CHF

dataMapping.expression: patient.Problem->select( problemCode.codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" and (problemCode.code="42343007" or problemCode.code="84114007") and problemStatus.codeSystem ="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" and problemStatus.code="55561003")->sortBy(problemDate.value)->last()

LogicalConditionSingle.title: No Echo
LogicalConditionSingle.description: No Echocardiogram was ever done (regardless of result)

dataMapping.title: Echocardiography as Test
dataMapping.description: Echocardiography Test Result available. Coded as LOINC. Note that we are not sure if Echocardiograms will be queried as Test Results, or as Procedures, or as both.
dataMapping.expression: patient.LaboratoryResult->select( resultType.code="34552-0" and resultType.codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" and resultStatus.code="completed" and resultStatus.codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.14")

dataMapping.title: Echocardiography as Procedure
dataMapping.description: Echocardiography Procedure available. Coded as SNOMEDCT. Note that we are not sure if Echocardiograms will be queried as Test Results, or as Procedures, or as both.
dataMapping.expression: patient.Procedure->select( procedureType.code="40701008" and procedureType.codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" and procedureStatus.code="completed" and procedureStatus.codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.14")

freeTextMessage.value: This patient had the diagnosis of CHF recorded on ${CHFProblem.problemDate}. However, there is no echocardiogram recorded for this patient. Because the treatment of systolic and diastolic dysfunction can be quite different, please order an echocardiogram for this patient.

LogicalConditionSingle.title: Adult Patient
LogicalConditionSingle.description: Patient is 18 years of age or older
LogicalConditionSingle.expression: Let year : CodedValue = Factory.CodedValue("2.16.840.1.113883.6.96", "258707000") in DoB.occurredAgo(18, year)
